definition: -ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct
face/side/surface/aspect/top/classifier for flat surfaces such as drums, mirrors, flags etc
floor area/occupied area/footprint (of a building, piece of equipment etc)
ground control (of airborne or space operation)
Ground Zero (refers to the site of the World Trade Center destroyed in 9-11-2001 attack)
Ground Zero (refers to the site of the World Trade Center destroyed in 9-11-2001 attack)

sentences.english: Star Wars are closely linked to conventional ground-combat.
sentences.chinese: 星球大戰與地面常規作戰之間有着密切的聯繫。

sentences.english: A spectrum is then obtained and telemetered to the ground.
sentences.chinese: 然後記錄它的光譜，並將數據通過遙測系統發回地面。

sentences.english: These antennas are commonly used at earth-based stations in satellite communications systems.
sentences.chinese: 這種螺旋天線常用於無形通訊系統中的地面臺站。

sentences.english: Accelerators are generally used in near-surface applications in which the temperature is relatively low.
sentences.chinese: 速凝劑一般在溫度相對較低的接近地面的情況下使用。

sentences.english: Bugfix related to optimizing Far-field data including surface-wave.
sentences.chinese: 修正了相關的優化遠場數據，包括地面波。

sentences.english: However, this came unstuck considering the mechanical layout.
sentences.chinese: 然而，這來未粘住的以機械的地面區劃看來。

sentences.english: Ground collapse is a common geological hazard in shallow buried karst area.
sentences.chinese: 地面塌陷是淺埋岩溶區常見的一種地質災害。

sentences.english: Industrial machinery or to prevent oil pollution on the ground.
sentences.chinese: 工業上可防止機械或地面上的油污染。

sentences.english: And it introduces the multifunctional aeronautic ground power system as a whole.
sentences.chinese: 對多功能航空地面電源系統做了總體介紹。

sentences.english: Suddenly the giddiness is gone, and I stare at the ground.
sentences.chinese: 突然那種恍惚不見了，我盯着地面。

sentences.english: The damp rising from the ground caused the walls to stain badly.
sentences.chinese: 地面上升起的潮氣使牆壁的顏色變得很難看。

sentences.english: In addition, the arable land area in Wushuihe river basin was correspondently enlarged during the period of the past 15 years.
sentences.chinese: 從土地利用變化來看，舞水河流域耕地面積不斷擴大。

sentences.english: It is at ground level at rear lane between How Ming Street and Chong Yip Street.
sentences.chinese: 位於巧明街及創業街之間的後巷地面。

sentences.english: The center of this groove is also half-way from the ceiling to the floor of the Grand Gallery.
sentences.chinese: 這些槽的中央也是從走廊的天花板都地面距離的一半。

sentences.english: He smiled and touched the ground with his hand, meaning that I should sit down.
sentences.chinese: 他微笑着並用手輕觸着地面，示意我坐下。

definition: to land/to touch the ground/also pr. [zhuo2 di4]
crushed or broken rock, stone etc
